Summary: Late media mogul Raymond Dokpesi helped scuttle Olusegun Obasanjo’s third-term agenda – Adams Oshiomole, Abubakar Momoh and Adams Oshomole . They recalled the late media mogul's role in halting alleged attempts by former President, Oluseunjo, to extend

Title: Odu’a Foundation showcases young tech innovators over two years of digital education
Summary: Odu’a Investment Foundation showcases young tech innovators over two years of digital education . The social impact arm of Odu'a Investment Company Limited (OICL) held a showcase for its Byte Busters Coding Club .

Title: ADC vows to restore party glory, warns against infiltration
Summary: National Leadership of the African Democratic Congress (ADC) reassured members and the general public of its commitment to restoring the integrity and glory of the party . It said the party had been infiltrated by individuals described as “political operatives”

Title: Court restrains factional NMA executives in Enugu
Summary: The Enugu State High Court has granted an ex parte order in favour of some members of the Nigeria Medical Association (NMA), Enugu state branch, restraining a faction of the association from parading . The order was granted by Justice C. A. Ogbuabor .

Title: Over N8b allocated for infrastructural development in Ondo Poly – TETFUND
Summary: N8.18 billion has been released to Rufus Giwa Polytechnic, Owo, Ondo State, for infrastructural development since 2011 . The intervention agency disclosed this over the weekend during the weekend .

Title: 5 African countries with most powerful passports in 2025
Summary: Seychelles tops Africa’s passport rankings in 2025, granting its citizens visa-free access to 156 destinations . It will be granted access to more than 156 destinations in Africa .

Title: Jegede chairs PDP elective national convention screening committee
Summary: Eyitayo Jegede is the Chairman of the PDP National Convention Screening Committee . The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) National Convention Organising Committee (NCOC) appoints him .

Title: EPL: Sunderland stun Chelsea to go second, Newcastle beat Fulham
Summary: Sunderland stun Chelsea to go second in the Premier League . Chemsdine Talbi's stoppage time winner stuns Chelsea . Newcastle also struck late to beat Fulham 2-1 on Saturday .

Title: Bayern move past 10-man Gladbach to stay five clear
Summary: Bayern move past 10-man Gladbach to stay five clear . Harry Kane had a goal chalked off for offside in the second half .

Title: Fully loaded truck plunges off Oshodi Bridge
Summary: Fully loaded truck plunges off Oshodi Bridge . Rescue teams rescued the injured victim and quickly restored traffic flow around the affected area . According to him, operatives arrived at the scene within minutes, rescued the victim .

Title: PDP unveils 13-member screening panel for national convention
Summary: The PDP has named a 13-member National Convention Screening Committee to vet aspirants for national offices ahead of the party’s much-anticipated 2025 Elective National Convention, slated for November 15–16, 2025, in Ibadan, Oyo State . The committee will be chaired by Eyitayo Jeg

Title: Police probe viral video of man with severed hand in Edo
Summary: The Edo State Police Command has confirmed a gruesome incident following the circulation of viral videos showing two young men brutally attacked, one of whom had his hand severed . The command said it has launched a full-scale investigation into the matter . One of the victims recounted the horrifying attack, saying he hid in a nearby bush for over three hours

Title: EPL: Newly-promoted Sunderland stun Chelsea 2–1 at Stamford Bridge
Summary: Newly-promoted Sunderland beat Chelsea 2-1 at Stamford Bridge on Saturday . Alejandro Garnacho opened his account for the Blues with a well-taken strike in the first five minutes . Title: Uzodimma condemns 'corpse water' widowhood practice in Imo, orders probe
Summary: Governor Hope Uzodimma of Imo State has ordered an investigation to fish out the proponents behind the instigation of the reintroduction of harmful widowhood practices in the state . Title: Police rescue kidnapped victim, recover firearm, in Enugu
Summary: The Police Command in Enugu State has rescued a kidnapped victim (name withheld due to security and investigation reasons) at Ozalla/Umueze axis of Nkanu West Local Government Area .
